td2ltg0KZhxpGcGK.name: Long Step Dash
td2ltg0KZhxpGcGK.description: When you use your Long Step to dash, you can spend a spell point to leave behind a damaging trail of an element you have elemental affinity with in each space you move through. The effect deals a number of d6s of damage of a type your elemental blast can deal equal to your proficiency bonus to creatures that enter an affected space for the first time on their turn or who start their turn there. The trail extends 5 feet up from the surface you moved across and persists until the beginning of your next turn.

system.description:
You have learned to merge your mastery of the elements and your mastery of yourself into a harmonious and powerful whole. You gain the following benefits:

  • Your Dexterity, Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma score increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.
  • You can change your elementalist spellcasting ability to Wisdom if you desire. Once made, this choice is permanent.
  • When you use your Long Step to dash, you can spend a spell point to leave behind a damaging trail of an element you have elemental affinity with in each space you move through. The effect deals a number of d6s of damage of a type your elemental blast can deal equal to your proficiency bonus to creatures that enter an affected space for the first time on their turn or who start their turn there. The trail extends 5 feet up from the surface you moved across and persists until the beginning of your next turn.
system.prerequisite: 3 levels in adept, 3 levels in elementalist
